config.question: Which of the following survivors is most likely to experience the poorest outcome after the death of a loved one?

choices.content: Lena, who had a secure relationship with her husband who has just died
Marvin, who had an ambivalent relationship with his wife who has just died
Trina, who has always been quite independent
Nikki, who has strong social support from her family and friends

answer_3.response: Consider this: Survivors who are most likely to experience poor post-death outcomes include those who had ambivalent relationships, those who are highly dependent, and those who lack social support from family and friends. LO 10.8 How do survivors react to and cope with death?
